```{r setup, include=FALSE}
library(tidyverse)
library(here)
library(janitor)
```

Read in data: 

```{r}
df <- read_csv(here::here("data", "all-data-combined.csv")) %>% 
  clean_names() %>% 
  mutate(ilfm = 1/lfm)
```

Make nice figures: 

#####Figure 3. 

```{r}
df %>% 
  ggplot(aes(y = lfm, x = mwp, color = study, shape = study)) + 
  geom_point(alpha = .6) +
  labs(y = "Midday Water Poential (MPa)", 
       x = "Live Fuel Moisture (%)", 
       color = "Study", 
       shape = "Study") +
  color +
  theme(legend.position.inside = c(0.1, 0.8))
```
